text: Layar LRT Station is an LRT station on the West Loop of the Sengkang LRT Line. It is on the western side of Sungei Punggol (Punggol River). It was opened together with the East Loop of the Punggol LRT Line. ==Name== "Layar" means "sail" in Malay. It is related to moving. ==Sources== ==Other websites== *SBS Transit Website Category:Sengkang Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Layar LRT Station
